Name: FormulaNext
About the game: FormulaNext is a technical racing game set in a futuristic world. Take control of your racing ship and challenge best players worldwide! Become the fastest and climb rankings! 10 cities of increasing difficulty, each consisting of 10 unique tracks Asynchronous online challenge against the best players on each track Gold, Silver and Bronze medals on each track
